sentences.en: At a pinch it can be used as a weapon.
sentences.cn: 必要时可以把它当作武器.

sentences.en: Discipline was the new coach's secret weapon.
sentences.cn: 严格的训练是新任教练的秘密武器。

sentences.en: Enriched uranium is a key component of a nuclear weapon.
sentences.cn: 浓缩铀是核武器的关键组成部分。

sentences.en: Exactly what can be called an offensive weapon is still a grey area.
sentences.cn: 究竟什么可称作进攻性武器仍然难以界定。

sentences.en: Officers combed the woods for the murder weapon.
sentences.cn: 警察在树林里四处搜寻凶器。

sentences.en: Police frogmen searched the lake for the murder weapon.
sentences.cn: 警方的蛙人搜索这个湖，寻找谋杀凶器。

sentences.en: She was charged with a misdemeanour, that of carrying a concealed weapon.
sentences.cn: 她被指控犯有身上藏有武器的轻罪。

sentences.en: The police nicked me for carrying an offensive weapon.
sentences.cn: 警察以携带攻击性武器为由逮捕了我。

sentences.en: The report outlined possible uses for the new weapon.
sentences.cn: 该报告概述了这种新式武器的可能用途。

sentences.en: The team's secret weapon was their new young defender.
sentences.cn: 这个队的秘密武器就是刚来的年轻防守队员.

sentences.en: Their most potent weapon was the Exocet missile.
sentences.cn: 飞鱼导弹是他们最有攻击力的武器。

sentences.en: They all had sticks which they planned to use as weapons.
sentences.cn: 他们都持有棍棒，打算当武器用。

sentences.en: They grappled desperately for control of the weapon.
sentences.cn: 他们疯狂扭打，想把武器抢到手。

sentences.en: They've stooped to using any and every weapon at their disposal.
sentences.cn: 他们已经无耻到把能用的武器都用上了。

sentences.en: This is the weapon that he used to defend himself withal.
sentences.cn: 这就是他用来自卫的武器.

sentences.en: This weapon can kill at a range of 200 yards.
sentences.cn: 这种兵器在200码内有杀伤力.

phrases.tran_cn: 武器管理系统；武器控制系统

trans.tran_en: something that you use to fight with or attack someone with, such as a knife, bomb, or gun
